Woah, I didn't know I was still a member of this board.
I'm glad to see that openglad-e is still in development.
I hope the classes get balanced, and the XP system stableized.
Then it would be perfect!

Too bad I can't get the shrouder source code to tapan-kaikki.
That would look sweet in glad.  I have my own shrouder code, but it's 
allegro-only and only supports polygons and line segments.
http://fuzinavl.tripod.com/
